trans-unit.source: Implements a markup extension that supports dynamic resource references made from XAML.
Dynamic resource references are necessary when referencing content that might change at run-time.
trans-unit.target: Dynamische Ressourcenverweise sind erforderlich, wenn Sie Inhalte zu verweisen, die zur Laufzeit ändern können.

trans-unit.source: The reasons for the content change might be application-initiated or might be external.
trans-unit.target: Die Gründe für die Änderung des Zertifikatinhalts möglicherweise Anwendung initiierte oder externe sein.

trans-unit.source: One example is if you are including styles that rely on system resources that report user-configured preferences, such as themes, font settings and so on.
trans-unit.target: Ein Beispiel ist, wenn Sie Stile einschließen, die Systemressourcen abhängig, die Benutzer konfigurierten Voreinstellungen, z. B. Designs, Schriftart und So weiter zu melden.

trans-unit.source: This class is a markup extension implementation.
trans-unit.target: Diese Klasse ist eine Implementierung der Markuperweiterung.

trans-unit.source: Markup extension classes in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and the members exposed by the markup extension classes are not typically called from directly user code.
trans-unit.target: Markuperweiterung Klassen im [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] vorhanden sind, hauptsächlich, dass die Infrastruktur für einige Aspekte der unterstützen die [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] -prozessorimplementierung sowie auf die Elemente, die von der Markuperweiterung Klassen werden nicht in der Regel aus aufgerufen verfügbar gemacht werden direkt Benutzercode.

trans-unit.source: This class particularly supports the [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md) usage from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Diese Klasse unterstützt, insbesondere die [DynamicResource Markuperweiterung](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md) Verwendung von [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: For more information about dynamic resource references, see [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: Weitere Informationen zu dynamischen Ressourcenverweise, finden Sie unter [DynamicResource Markuperweiterung](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DynamicResourceExtension" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DynamicResourceExtension" /> class.
The key of the resource that this markup extension references.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DynamicResourceExtension" /> class, with the provided initial key.

This constructor is used by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processors when processing the attribute syntax for the [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: Dieser Konstruktor wird verwendet, indem [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] Prozessoren, die beim Verarbeiten der Attributsyntax für die [DynamicResource Markuperweiterung](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).

trans-unit.source: Object that can provide services for the markup extension.
Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied.

For <see cref="T:System.Windows.DynamicResourceExtension" />, this is the object found in a resource dictionary in the current parent chain that is keyed by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.DynamicResourceExtension.ResourceKey" />.
The object to set on the property where the extension is applied.
Rather than the actual value, this will be an expression that will be evaluated at a later time.

This method supports [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: Diese Methode unterstützt [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] -prozessorimplementierung, und sollte nicht direkt aufgerufen werden.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md) values during object creation.
trans-unit.target: Die [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] -prozessorimplementierung verwendet diese Methode für die ordnungsgemäße Behandlung von [DynamicResource Markuperweiterung](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md) Werte während der Erstellung des Objekts.

trans-unit.source: The property to be set by the provided value must be of type <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>.
trans-unit.target: Die Eigenschaft durch den angegebenen Wert festgelegt werden muss vom Typ <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>.

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not rely on any services based on the passed `serviceProvider`.
trans-unit.target: Diese Implementierung nicht auf alle Dienste, die basierend auf übergebenem beruht `serviceProvider`.

trans-unit.source: Attempted to provide a value for an extension that did not provide a <paramref name="resourceKey" />.
Gets or sets the key specified by this dynamic resource reference.
The key is used to lookup a resource in resource dictionaries, by means of an intermediate expression.
The resource key that this dynamic resource reference specifies.
trans-unit.target: Der Ressourcenschlüssel, der diese dynamischen Ressourcenverweis angibt.

trans-unit.source: The key is not strongly typed, but is usually provided as either a string, a <xref:System.Type>, or a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceKey> derived class.
trans-unit.target: Der Schlüssel ist nicht stark typisiert, jedoch in der Regel als entweder eine Zeichenfolge bereitgestellt wird eine <xref:System.Type>, oder ein <xref:System.Windows.ResourceKey> abgeleitete Klasse.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).
